com.azwave.androidzwave.zwave

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azwave.androidzwave.zwave.Manager

  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which handle all the others. Create the driver to allow the application to use the Zwave usb controller. Create the NodeManager which manage all the Nodes found on the Zwave network.
    Author:
    florian.malapel@gmail.com
